title: Joe Jacobs: stone carver
creator_credit: Geoff Voyce, National Indian Arts and Crafts and BT Film-Sound
brief_description: Documentary on stone carving. Joe Jacobs found he had a talent for carving after an accident in the building trade by using simple hand tools to depict his American Indian heritage.
creator_credit_for_label: Geoff Voyce, National Indian Arts and Crafts and BT Film-Sound
